name: Doug
Dialogue: Huh? I ran out of POKEMON!

name: Anthony
Dialogue: I give! You're good at this!

name: Greg
Dialogue: If I had new POKEMON I would've won!

name: Jovan
Dialogue: Your POKEMON are not good enough

name: Liam
Dialogue: Darn! Light years isn't time! It measures distance!

name: Brock
Dialogue: I took you for granted. As proof of your victory, here's the BOULDERBADGE! That's an official POKEMON LEAGUE BADGE! Its bearer's POKEMON become more powerful! The technique FLASH can now be used any time!

name: Team Rocket Grunt
Dialogue: Stop! I give up! I'll leave quietly!

name: Misty
Dialogue:
Wow! You're too much! All right! You can have the CASCADEBADGE
to show you beat me!
The CASCADEBADGE makes all POKEMON up to L30 obey! That includes
even outsiders! There's more, you can now use CUT any time!
You can CUT down small bushes to open new paths! You can also
have my favorite TM!

name: Huey
Dialogue: Oh no! I went around the world for these!

name: Ann
Dialogue: Darn! I let that one get away!

name: Brooks
Dialogue: Good fight! Ah, I feel young again!

name: Lt. Surge
Dialogue:
Whoa! You're the real deal, kid! Fine then, take the THUNDERBADGE!
The THUNDERBADGE cranks up your POKEMON's SPEED! It also lets
your POKEMON FLY any time, kid! You're special, kid! Take this!

name: Jeremy
Dialogue: Keep it coming, eh! Oh wait. I'm out of POKEMON!

name: Brent
Dialogue: WHAT? What a total waste of time!

name: Allen
Dialogue: I give! You're a better technician!

name: Oliver
Dialogue: Ease up! What am I doing? Which way is out?

name: Clark
Dialogue: Ha-haha! Not laughing! Ha-hay fever! Haha-ha-choo!

name: Julia
Dialogue: Stop! Don't be so mean to my CLEFAIRY!

name: Erika
Dialogue:
Oh! I concede defeat. You are remarkably strong. I must confer
you the RAINBOWBADGE.

The RAINBOWBADGE will make POKEMON up to L50 obey. It also allows
POKEMON to use STRENGTH in and out of battle. Please also take
this with you.

name: Dirk
Dialogue: Darn! I need to make my POKEMON stronger!

name: Connor
Dialogue: How did you know I was a ROCKET?

name: Sabrina
Dialogue:
I'm shocked! But, a loss is a loss. I admit I didn't work hard
enough to win! You earned the MARSHBADGE!
The MARSHBADGE makes POKEMON up to L70 obey you! Stronger POKEMON
will become wild, ignoring your orders in battle! Just don't
raise your POKEMON too much! Wait, please take this TM with you!
TM46 is PSYWAVE! It uses powerful psychic waves to inflict damage!

name: Koga
Dialogue:
Humph! You have proven your worth! Here! Take the SOULBADGE!
Now that you have the SOULBADGE, the DEFENSE of your POKEMON
increases! It also lets you SURF outside of battle! Ah! Take this
too!
TM06 contains TOXIC! It is a secret technique over 400 years old!

name: Ted
Dialogue: Oh no! My bag of loot!

name: Blaine
Dialogue:
I have burnt out! You have earned the VOLCANOBADGE!
Hah! The VOLCANOBADGE heightens the SPECIAL abilities of your
POKEMON! Here, you can have this too!
TM38 contains FIRE BLAST! Teach it to fire-type POKEMON!
CHARMELEON or PONYTA would be good bets!

name: Giovanni
Dialogue:
Ha! That was a truly intense fight! You have won! As proof,
here is the EARTHBADGE!
The EARTHBADGE makes POKEMON of any level obey! It is evidence
of your mastery as a POKEMON trainer! With it, you can enter the
POKEMON LEAGUE! It is my gift for your POKEMON LEAGUE challenge!
TM27 is FISSURE! It will take out POKEMON with just one hit!
I made it when I ran the GYM here, too long ago...

name: Agatha
Dialogue: Oh ho! You're something special, child!

name: Lance
Dialogue: That's it! I hate to admit it, but you are a POKEMON master!
